Valve.VR.InteractionSystem Namespace Reference

Classes

class  Attachment
 Basic class for all drill attachments. Defines an universal offset and the action to change the drill. More...
 
class  CaseController
 The CaseController administrates the different cases being provided in the document folder of the user. Each case requires several steps in their correct order to be performed. Based on voice inputs the user is either in the training mode or the case mode. The steps can be changed to a previous / following step as long as the user is in the training mode. In the case mode the steps have to be followed accordingly to get to the next step. More...
 
class  Chisel
 Base class for all chisels. Defines the actions when in combination with a hammer. More...
